answers.answer: Yeahhh congrats mommy.Love to lil one and all the best for ur recovery:-). :-)

Congratulations Mommy!!  :) <3 I'm in labor now,  awaiting our baby boy,  he's my and my husband's family's first boy in 12 years,  and our parents only grandson!  :-D getting induced midnight tomorrow if he don't come today,  doctor already pulled his mucas plug today,  already 8 lbs.
@IamMrsFoxCongrats and keep us posted on ur labor.We eager to hear the good news soon.:-). :-)
Congrats iammrsfox keep us posted on wishing you a healthy and safe delivery blessings
Thank you both Mommys, I am nervous its been 10 years since last one and just turned 34 years old,  I been on this app since 8 weeks pregnant now offically 39 1/2 weeks phew.. ..lol
I kno what you mean @iammrsfox my kids are also 10 years apart it will take some adjusting .. I didnt realize how rusty I am until my baby got here a week ago lol

by IamMrsFox, 3 minutesJoshua is here the day I posted this, I end up with bloody show a couple hours later,  and headed into hospital and started having close contractions and delivered the next day,  In afternoon, he was 7 lbs 14 oz,  20 inches long and I used epidural at 5 Cm dilated,  pushed him out vaginally in 15 minutes, no pain but alot of vomiting during delivery due to gestational diabetes no doubt,  we both made it and both  healthy and healing :-) very blessed how wonderful it is,  so worth all the pains :-)

question: I was 41 weeks when my bundle of joy made his appearance on the 11th of this month. Those 22 hours of labor was worth it!
title: My Prince finally came
